page.title: 07 YOUTH CLUB
page.content:
{Ash Youth Club }is held on Friday each week,from 7.30p.m. until 10.00p.m.It is held in the village hall in the Main Street Ash and has been running for eight years.You have to be 10 years old to be able to join. The leaders are {Neil Evans}and { {Mark Hilliard}.About 30 people attend the youth club every week. At the youth club we can play table_tennis and snooker,we also listen to records and rush about. Refreshments like crisps,sweets and drinks are on sale all night. Special activities are organised by the Yeovil Youth Area throughout the year.One of these was the triathlon which was a sponsored activity to raise money for charity.
Sarah Bowen Kelly Russell Sally Kempster Charlotte Strange.
